description_en: A note from someone about their missing pet
This gem has some sort of power to it...
A massive emerald that's worth 500 gp.
This surprisingly tasty potion is actually very healthy; perfect for getting your friends in shape!
Warms the heart as well as the mind
damage: this potion knows how to revive the primary instincts of your guests...

description_en: A potion full of sparkling energy! Every young witches will love it!
